General.Name: Aeorema Communications Plc
General.Description: Aeorema Communications plc, a live events agency, engages in the devising and delivering of corporate communication solutions in the United Kingdom, the United States, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Cheerful Scout plc and changed its name to Aeorema Communications plc in December 2011. Aeorema Communications plc was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 64 New Cavendish Street, London, United Kingdom, W1G 8TB
